commonPolicyObject.description: The container that holds the key value for securities

customerReference.description: A user supplied reference to identify the insurance policy. Must be between 1 and 25 characters in length.

event.description: Details of each individual policy event. Must be between 1 and 75 characters in length.

gainAmount.description: The amount of the gain. The value must be between 0.01 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on each gain. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

yearsHeld.description: The number of years the policy has been held. The value must be between 0 and 99 no decimals.

yearsHeldSinceLastGain.description: The number of years the policy has been held since the last gain. The value must be between 0 and 99 no decimals.

deficiencyRelief.description: The amount of available relief. The value must be between 0.01 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

voidedIsaObject.description: The container that holds the key value for securities

event.description: Details of each individual policy event. Must be between 1 and 75 characters in length.

gainAmount.description: The amount of the gain. The value must be between 0.01 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxPaid.description: The amount of tax paid on each gain. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

yearsHeld.description: The number of years the policy has been held. The value must be between 0 and 99 no decimals.

yearsHeldSinceLastGain.description: The number of years the policy has been held since the last gain. The value must be between 0 and 99 no decimals.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative URL of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The ‘rel’ will be ‘self’ where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
